description: This Dart source file defines a LocalStorage class that provides methods to persist and retrieve a user's role using shared preferences.

classes.name: LocalStorage
classes.description: A helper class for storing and retrieving simple app state data related to user roles using shared preferences.

methods.name: saveRole
methods.description: Persists the user role as a string in shared preferences.

methods.name: loadRole
methods.description: Retrieves the stored user role string from shared preferences, returning null if not set.
